channel.title: Communication to server - help
channel.description:
I am wanting to do something new. my question is what are the minimum methods to communicate with a server? methods to build, read, and right packets; and etc. but im sure there are more than what i mentioned. if i dont get help here. then ill just look at the source code of a program that isnt the rs client but can still connects and communicates with the servers.
thx in advanced
